item.description:
Craig ("Hezi") Kugler, Chairman of the Israeli Clean Energy Alliance and former Director General of Israel's Ministry of National Infrastructures, will share his perspective on Israel's cleantech sector.

Agenda:
6:30-7:00pm Networking & Intros
7:00-8:00pm Presentation and Q&A
8:00-8:30pm Member Announcements & Networking

The Boston Israel Cleantech Alliance is pleased to co-sponsor this event with the New England Israel Business Council, Consulate General of Israel to New England, MISTI - MIT Israel program, MIT Sloan Israeli Business Club, MIT Sloan Energy & Environment Club, MIT Energy Club, and Combined Jewish Philanthropies.

Directions and parking information are available at http://hst.mit.edu/se...


Bio: Hezi Kugler

Mr. Kugler is the Chairman of the Israeli Clean Energy Alliance, a new not-for-profit group dedicated to promoting the Israeli clean energy sector and turning Israel into a major player in the international clean energy arena. Mr. Kugler was the Director General of Israel's Ministry of National Infrastructures from September 2006 â€“ May 2009. At the Ministry of National Infrastructures, Mr. Kugler played a central role in devising Israeli energy policy, including the tenders for the first major solar energy plants in Israel, fostering close cooperation with the U.S. Department of Energy, and a $10 billion overhaul of Israel's power sector.
item.name: An Insider's View of Israeli Cleantech: An Evening With Hezi Kugler
